title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.2 - Eligibility to continue as amateur rider
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.2 - Eligibility to continue as amateur rider

State Regulations

After an amateur rider has ridden six races in any one
year, either steeplechase or flat, under recognized rules in any country, such
rider may be required to appear before the stewards of the National

Steeplechase and Hunt Association to determine such rider's eligibility to
continue to ride as an amateur rider, and the stewards may require a rider to
appear before them again at any future time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4064.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
